code: import React,{useState}from"react";import authService from"../services/authService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterForm=_ref=>{let{role}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await authService.register(name,email,password,role);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:role==="barber"?"Register as Barber":"Register as Client"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});};export default RegisterForm;
